MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in Llangernyw and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.09PM. Our engineers are on site making repairs to a broken piece of overhead line equipment and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.27PM on 23rd February 2021.
